title: Semiotic Critical Thinking Instructional Design for Elementary Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. The course emphasizes designing and evaluating multimodal representation systems using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze and improve various semiotic models (tables, graphs, diagrams, etc.) that explain elementary science concepts.
Learners execute iterative revision and supplementation procedures for scientific representation systems during collaborative problem-solving processes.
Learners design and evaluate the validity of visual representation systems for scientific data using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
